name: A Fire In Origami Town
description:
In this text adventure game, follow the life of Lucky, a child with extraordinary powers who's in a quest to become the greatest martial artist in the world.

As you go through the game, you will be able to make decisions which will shape the path which your story takes. Use your mouse and left-click or right click to make those decisions.

You will also participate in a couple of mini games, which are the memory game and the point & click battle mini game.

For the memory mini game, simply use your mouse and left-click on the items you want to select.

For the battle mini-game, use your mouse to left-click on the moving target. Clicking on the red area will deal normal damage to your opponent, while clicking on the white area will deal increased damage.

This is only episode 1 of what will be a long and engaging story.

We hope you enjoy our very first game. Tell us what you think, but most importantly thank you for playing, have a wonderful time. :-)
